article.title: EDO to Support Electronic Countermeasures System
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: EDO Corporation, Amityville, N.Y., is being awarded a $9,445,643 cost plus fixed price, cost reimbursement no fee and firm-fixed-price contract to procure engineering support for AN/ALQ-161A preprocessor flight software 6.20 sustainment effort. The contracting activity is the Air Force Life Cyble Management Center, Robins Air Force Base, Ga.
